pychell API reference¶

class pychell.reduce.data2d.BiasImage(input_file=None, header_keys=None, parse_header=False, output_path_root=None, hdu_num=0, time_offset=0, filename_parser=None, img_num=None, n_tot_imgs=None)¶

coadd(method='sum')¶

Co-adds the images

Kwargs:

method (str): Either sum or median.

load()¶

Loads and returns the order map image and pickled dictionary file

Returns

The order map image list: The list of dictionaries for each order

Return type

np.ndarray

class pychell.reduce.data2d.RawImage(input_file, output_path, parser)¶

Bases: pychell.reduce.data2d.SpecDataImage

Base class for a raw, unmodified spectral data image (i.e., not modified other than possible readmath).

parser¶

The parser object, must extend the Parser object.

Type

Parser

Default basic initializer.

Parameters

  • input_file (str) – The full path + filename of the corresponding file.

  • output_path (str) – The root output path for this run.

class pychell.reduce.data2d.SpecDataImage(input_file, output_path)¶

Bases: object

A base class for a spectral echelle image.

input_file¶

The full path + filename of the corresponding file.

Type

str

base_input_file¶

The filename of the corresponding file with the path removed.

Type

str

parser¶

The parser object, must extend the Parser object.

Type

Parser

output_path¶

The root output path for this run.

Type

str

Default basic initializer.

Parameters

  • input_file (str) – The full path + filename of the corresponding file.

  • output_path (str) – The root output path for this run.

static generate_data_cube(data_list)¶

Generates a data-cube (i.e., stack) of images.

Parameters

data_list (list) – A list of data objects.

Returns

The generated data cube, with shape=(n_images, ny, nx).

Return type

data_cube (np.ndarray)
